summary: Your level 100 smithing skill  can't forge this metal!
descriptionHtml:
this file only replaces the default music in skyrim, It is replaced it with [size=5] [color=#ff0000][i]METAL version [/i]of the music[/color][/size]
it replaces:[quote][b][color=#00ffff][size=4]The main theme song and when fighting  dragons with this:
[/size][/color]Credits to Sbeast for this song https://www.youtube.com/user/sbeast64[/b][/quote]
         [youtube]gyCFuP3rM2w[/youtube]
[quote][color=#00ffff][size=4]the music when you are in the  INN (the bannered mare)
[/size][/color][b]Credits to Peripheric for this song https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4gMEwha02RUNY6BmLSZTQA[/b][/quote]
         [youtube]mEEXoLxn0gA[/youtube]




 
 
 
[img]http://www.relatably.com/m/img/brutal-memes/dc8f4cc01c03ee628dc8a50bd9b543d1a741c508164225df6db3e03eaf8717ab.jpg[/img]
[color=#666666]Image source: quickmeme.com[/color]


[b][i][color=#0000ff][size=3]
[/size][/color][/i][/b][i][b][color=#ff7700][size=3]INSTALLATION [/size][/color][/b]
just extract the music file to your  skyrim/DATA folder [/i]

[color=#ff0000][size=3]
I don't claim any ownership of this music I just converted them to xwm format to make skyrim more lively,[/size][/color]

Have fun killing the Dragons :)
author: deus ex 24
